tool_description: Converts meeting times across different time zones for participants, ensuring accurate scheduling across global teams.

meeting_times.description: Array of meeting times to convert

error_messages: Invalid timezone format: Use standard timezone names like America/New_York or Europe/London.
Invalid meeting time format: Meeting times must be valid ISO 8601 timestamp strings.
Timezone not recognized: One or more timezone identifiers are not valid.
Too many conversions requested: Maximum 20 meeting times and 10 target timezones allowed.
usage: Provide meeting_times array, source_timezone, and target_timezones array. Returns the same meeting times converted to each target timezone with clear labeling.

converted_times.description: Array of converted meeting times with timezone labels

time_differences.description: Hour differences between source and each target timezone
